name: Petey Pedro unBEETable Adventure
description:
A nostalgic game for those RAD 80's and 90's kids. Help Petey Pedro get back home after falling into a magical world where the SWEETS he chose over a healthy beet are now his worst nightmare.


Over 55 Levels to beat and master. Hand crafter themed pixel graphic levels each with a unique soundtrack.




    *Collect coins to upgrade your GLASSES giving you VISION POWER with new SKILLS
    *Collect Hidden Magical Eggs
    *GET the Speed Runner Glasses




Every world has a puzzle stage to find. Your KEY to finding these are your observation skills.




Unlock a SPECIAL badge icon if you can beat the RECORD.




As a big thank you to those of you who purchase the game at launch thru steam, there will be NEW FREE LEVELS ADDED in the future. In 2024, four seasonal theme levels with fun new challenges will be added. Reserve your copy today!


Indie games are all a labor of love and our amazing community is the driving force behind some amazing games. I want to reward all of you amazing players that stream your favorite games. If you play Petey Pedro unBEETable Adventure and stream it in your channel please write to us at contact@sparkleybarkleygames.com and we will add your name or handle to the special thanks section in the credits. Deadline is 12/5/2023 THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!!!

Warning: Game contains colorful imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition.
